TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Cursors extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 物件的集合供 Windows Form 應用程式使用。

span.span: Provides a collection of objects for use by a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分比說明不同的外觀會採用此類別中的物件。Some of the objects in this class can take on a different appearance than those described. 使用者可以藉由調整滑鼠指標設定作業系統中的變更游標外觀。The user can change the cursor appearance by adjusting the mouse pointer settings in their operating system. 平移和移動資料指標是靜態的而且作業系統將無法變更。The panning and no move cursors are static and cannot be changed by the operating system. 平移和移動滑鼠滾輪作業期間使用資料指標。The panning and no move cursors are used during mouse wheel operations. 根據視窗可以捲動的方向，游標會變更為適當移動資料指標在按下滑鼠滾輪時。Depending on the direction the window can be scrolled, the cursor changes to the appropriate no move cursor when the mouse wheel is clicked. 資料指標則變更適當的移動游標移動滑鼠時。The cursor then changes to the appropriate panning cursor as the mouse is moved. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何變更滑鼠資料指標使用屬性，類別，而類別。The following example demonstrates changing the mouse cursor using the property, the class, and the class. 此範例會建立包含表單的控制項，控制項和控制項。The example creates a form that contains a control, a control, and a control. 包含所提供的所有資料指標類別。The contains all cursors provided by the class. 當使用者選取的滑鼠游標置於、屬性設定為選取的資料指標，它會更新資料指標， 。When the user selects a mouse cursor in the , the property is set to the selected cursor, which updates the cursor for the . 會更新每次就會發生事件。The is updated every time the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/CPP/cursorexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/CS/cursorexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/VB/cursorexample.vb#1)] 下列範例會和在一般的大小，以自動縮放模式，其大小的兩倍表單上繪製指定的資料指標。The following example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 這個範例假設您有和時要傳遞至方法呼叫它的物件。This example assumes that you have a and a object to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

span.span: The that represents the cursor that appears when an application starts.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範類別。The following example demonstrates the class. 若要執行此範例位置在表單中貼上下列程式碼，並從表單的建構函式或 Load 方法呼叫 InitializeRadioButtonsAndGroupBox 方法。To run this example place paste the following code in a form and call the InitializeRadioButtonsAndGroupBox method from the form's constructor or Load method. 請確定所有事件都已都連接至其事件處理方法。Ensure all events are connected to their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法在衍生類別中的，使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class and using the property. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼在新的表單並貼上這個類別相同的檔案格式之後。To run the example, paste the following code in a new form and paste this class, forming the same file, after the form. 將類型 FunButton 的按鈕加入至表單。Add a button of type FunButton to the form. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範類別。The following example demonstrates the class. 若要執行此範例位置在表單中貼上下列程式碼，並從表單的建構函式或 Load 方法呼叫 InitializeRadioButtonsAndGroupBox 方法。To run this example place paste the following code in a form and call the InitializeRadioButtonsAndGroupBox method from the form's constructor or Load method. 請確定所有事件都已都連接至其事件處理方法。Ensure all events are connected to their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Forms.Cursor VSplit { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Forms.Cursor VSplit
Public Shared ReadOnly Property VSplit As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ VSplit { System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得當滑鼠位在垂直分割列上方時出現的游標。

span.span: Gets the cursor that appears when the mouse is positioned over a vertical splitter bar.

value.span: 物件，表示當滑鼠位在垂直分割列上方時出現的游標。

span.span: The that represents the cursor that appears when the mouse is positioned over a vertical splitter bar.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Forms.Cursor WaitCursor { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Forms.Cursor WaitCursor
Public Shared ReadOnly Property WaitCursor As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ WaitCursor { System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得等待游標，其形狀通常為沙漏形狀。

span.span: Gets the wait cursor, typically an hourglass shape.

value.span: ，表示等待游標。

span.span: The that represents the wait cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要強制顯示等待游標，透過指定的控制項，呼叫該控制項的方法。To force display of the wait cursor over a given control, call that control's method. 若要讓整個應用程式，不論在控制項或表單選取，顯示等待游標呼叫上類別。To make the wait cursor display for the entire application, regardless of the control or form selected, call on the class.
